comments.author: slowvelder
comments.content: Have you thought about coming to South Africa?

comments.author: rheide
comments.content: Actually, I haven't. But now that you mention it I guess it's worth considering. Any good university you can recommend?

comments.author: slowvelder
comments.content: There are quite a few worth looking at - I think some are affiliated with Dutch Universities.  Take a look at Stellenbosch-in the winelands in the Cape, If you prefer the city - University of Cape Town is good. The other three I would look at would be the University of Pretoria, University of Potchefstroom or Rhodes University.
